# Draft:Hybrid Software

[https://hybridsoftware.com/ Hybrid Software], [https://live.euronext.com/en/product/equities/GB00BYN5BY03-XBRU Hybrid Software Group PLC] on Euronext Brussels,  is a global software company that develops prepress workflow automation and production tools for the label and packaging industry. The company specializes in prepress software for packaging, labels, folding cartons, corrugated, metal cans and flexible materials, offering both on-premises and cloud-based solutions.
Hybrid Software is headquartered in Merelbeke, Belgium, with regional offices in Germany, the United States, the United Kingdom, Italy, France, and China.
History
Hybrid Software was founded in 2007 and has since grown through product development and strategic acquisitions. It became part of Hybrid Software Group (formerly Global Graphics PLC) in 2021, forming a broader ecosystem of printing and prepress technology providers that includes ColorLogic, iC3D, Xitron, and Meteor Inkjet.
In 2024, Hybrid Software launched a new business unit, Hybrid BrandZ , aimed at brand owners, retailers and CPGs, introducing Artflow, a SaaS-based artwork management, 3D visualization and approval platform.
Products and Technology
Hybrid Software develops a portfolio of tools tailored to the packaging lifecycle:
* PACKZ – A PDF editor optimized for labels and packaging, offering prepress automation, trapping, and step-and-repeat features. In June 2025, PACKZ Max was introduced, including integrated RIPping in the prepress editor.
* CLOUDFLOW – A modular workflow automation platform for file processing, proofing, and color management. MyCOUDFLOW is the SaaS version.
* iC3D – A 3D visualization tool for packaging design, capable of real-time rendering and embellishment simulation.
* Artflow – A cloud-based artwork approval and lifecycle management tool aimed at brands, retailers and CPGs.
* SmartDFE – A digital front end using AI for high-speed digital press environments, developed by Hybrid Software’s OEM division, Global Graphics Software.
The company has also introduced tools like PACKZ VDP Execute, Packzimizer (for sheet layout optimization), and CLOUDFLOW Colorspace, an award-winning color consistency system.
Industry Events
* Fusion Packaging Summit 2025 – Co-hosted a multi-vendor event in Amsterdam focused on packaging innovation and open standards, such as a revised CF2 file format for carton production.
Awards and Recognition
Hybrid Software’s CLOUDFLOW Colorspace module received both the European Digital Press (EDP) Award and the Pinnacle Product Award in 2025 for excellence in color management and extended gamut processing.
The company’s SmartDFE technology was also recognized with The King’s Award for Enterprise (UK) for innovation in AI-based print production workflows.
